title: Discovery of 3,5-disubstituted-1H-pyrrolo[2,3-b]pyridines as potent inhibitors of the insulin-like growth factor-1 receptor (IGF-1R) tyrosine kinase.
abstract_text: Exploration of the SAR around a series of 3,5-disubstituted-1H-pyrrolo[2,3-b]pyridines led to the discovery of novel pyrrolopyridine inhibitors of the IGF-1R tyrosine kinase. Several compounds demonstrated nanomolar potency in enzyme and cellular mechanistic assays.
full_text_abstract: Exploration of the SAR around a series of 3,5-disubstituted-1H-pyrrolo[2,3-b]pyridines led to the discovery of novel pyrrolopyridine inhibitors of the IGF-1R tyrosine kinase. Several compounds demonstrated nanomolar potency in enzyme and cellular mechanistic assays.
